company_description: 2XU is a market leader in premium performance-focused active wear with specialized emphasis on compression garments. The product range extends across the full life cycle of athletic performance with focus on solutions across preparation, performance, and recovery. 2XU's products are regularly worn by elite athletes globally across multiple disciplines and the brand is recognized as a trendsetter in the sportswear markets of Australia, UK, and Scandinavia.

98point6 Technologies fits into your life, not the other way around. And when you change the way you think about getting primary care, it's easier than ever to take charge of your health. Founded in 2015, 98point6 Technologies is pioneering a new approach to primary care. By pairing AI and machine learning with board-certified physicians, 98point6 Technologies aims to make primary care more accessible and affordable, leading to better health care. 98point6 Technologies licenses their flagship cloud-based software to health systems. The software offers customers private, text-based diagnosis and treatment via a mobile app.
Aleph Farms is a cellular agriculture company that designs new ways to grow quality animal products to improve sustainability, food security, and animal welfare in food systems.

Alliance Animal Health is a multi-site owner, operator, and business partner to veterinarians across the United States. Their partnership model allows veterinarians to continue practicing medicine independently while receiving resources and assistance in business operations. Veterinarians retain the benefits of an independent practice while gaining advantages of being part of a larger organization, including access to marketing, inventory management expertise, purchasing power, collaborative synergies, and financial resources.

A distinctive French premium designer brand with a strong heritage and ESG at core since inception. Founded in Paris in 1987 by Jean Touitou, Atelier de Production et de Création (A.P.C.) first gained recognition for its use of high-quality raw materials, minimalist style, and strong cultural universe, and has successfully developed its range of women’s and men’s ready-to-wear clothing and accessories to establish itself as a leading French cult clothing brand. Since inception, the brand has held true to its core values of authenticity, quality, creativity, accessibility, and edginess, while being a pioneer in ESG commitments, attracting the support of numerous renowned artists and celebrities and creating a vibrant and loyal community of customers spanning all ages. A.P.C. is truly an international brand supported by a strong distribution footprint with approximately 100 retail stores and a highly curated wholesale network in 70 countries.

Artsy's user-friendly apps link galleries and auction houses to collectors and other would-be art buyers, particularly those who may not have visited the galleries listed on the site or attended an art auction in person.

The Amazing Brentwood consists in the redevelopment of a super-regional shopping destination to create a unique and innovative mixed-use asset strategically located in one of the wealthiest areas of Vancouver. L Catterton Real Estate has joined Shape and HOOPP as strategic partner in the development of a unique and innovative mixed-use asset located in Vancouver: The Amazing Brentwood. With a view to bring the best of Vancouver to one amazing place, the project will offer an enjoyable and exciting lifestyle experience through +250 shops (from mainstream fast fashion to high end boutiques), a highly anticipated culinary collection, office campuses, +6,000 homes and a one-acre plaza, all connected to rapid transit at a rare 28-acre site in the heart of the region.

Asiaray Media Group is a leading out-of-home media company in Greater China with a strategic focus on airport and metro line advertising. It is ranked first among privately-owned media companies in terms of revenue from, and number of, airports with exclusive concession rights to mainstream media resources, and ranked third among privately-owned media companies both in terms of revenue from, and number of, metro lines with exclusive rights to mainstream media resources in Greater China in 2013. With an extensive nationwide network of media resources covering 33 cities in Greater China, the Group leverages its well-developed space management approach to deliver integrated, creative out-of-home media solutions to renowned and diverse advertiser customers.

Barcelona Wine Bar is a warm and welcoming experiential tapas bar inspired by the culture of Spain. The ever-changing food forward menu is focused on clean flavors, seasonal ingredients, international specialties, and an award-winning selection of wines. Founded in 1995, Barcelona Wine Bar was designed to create memorable experiences serving Spanish tapas and simple yet elegant small, shareable plates in a vibrant, small format environment with a local neighborhood feel. Barcelona Wine Bar offers a seasonal, chef-driven menu combining bold flavors and unique specialties from Spain with an award-winning wine program that offers extensive selections from Spain and South America. All Barcelona Wine Bar restaurants are Wine Spectator's 'Best of Award of Excellence' winners, a distinction given to restaurants that display breadth across multiple winegrowing regions.

As a neighborhood drop-in place for lunch, a casual supper or anything in between, bartaco is hard to beat. Founded in 2010 by an experienced group of restaurateurs, bartaco was created to serve upscale street food with a coastal vibe in a relaxed environment. Inspired by the beach cultures of Brazil, Uruguay, and Southern California, bartaco evokes a visit to stylish resort and leaves customers with an unforgettable experience. Today, bartaco is a unique and experiential, small format concept offering shareable plates with locations in several markets across the country. Bartaco has a creative yet simple menu that is food forward, pulling flavors from Mexico, South America, the Mediterranean, and Asia, while offering award-winning cocktails made with artisanal spirits and freshly-squeezed juices.

Branded gourmet dates, confectionaries, cafes and more. Bateel is a leading brand in the gourmet food market. With a market presence in fourteen countries across Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, and the Middle East, Bateel’s deluxe boutiques and elegant cafés adorn premium shopping destinations in major cities. Bateel established its prominent brand position by creating the market for gourmet dates and date confectionery. This bold and pioneering achievement provided Bateel with a valuable launching pad to expand to complementary sectors in the gourmet food industry. Today, using its unrivaled integrated production and distribution assets, Bateel offers a comprehensive range of sweet and savory foods as well as premium shopping and dining experiences.

Ben & Frank is disrupting the traditional optical industry in Latin America through a direct-to-consumer (DTC), customer-centric, omnichannel strategy offering fashionable and accessible eyewear. Founded in 2015 and based in Mexico City, Ben & Frank is a leading DTC and omnichannel eyewear brand providing high-quality prescription glasses and sunglasses at value-oriented prices. The company has eliminated intermediaries through its DTC model, focusing on superior customer experience and affordability. Ben & Frank has boosted the highest NPS score in the category.

Better.com is a digital-first homeownership company offering mortgage, real estate, title, and homeowners' insurance services. It aims to make homeownership cheaper, faster, and more accessible for all Americans.
The leading platform in the rapidly growing, global hair extensions category, comprising a premier portfolio of 13 market-leading brands.

Digital-first fashion and lifestyle destination for modern women sized 10-30. BloomChic exists to enable mid- and plus-size women around the world to easily find clothes that fit them and their lives. Founded on core values such as inclusivity, empowerment, and accessibility, the company provides a wide variety of stylish, fitting, and comfortable clothes at affordable price points. New offerings are first tested in very small batches, leveraging a data-driven process as well as the founding team's production management experience and relationships with top suppliers, to maximize customer satisfaction and efficiency. With a focus on community-building as well, the brand has garnered a strong following across multiple social media platforms and offline groups, where it engages consumers with informative content and impactful narratives.

Bodytech is the leading fitness chain in the Andean region, with corporate headquarters in Bogota, Colombia. It features state-of-the-art fitness equipment, specialized class instruction, and differentiates itself as a holistic fitness chain, providing services including physical therapy and wellness programs in modern gym facilities. Founded in 1997 by entrepreneurs Nicolas Loaiza and Gigliola Aycardi, Bodytech is the market leader in the Andean region with more than 140 health clubs throughout Colombia, Peru, and Chile. Bodytech has a membership base of over 250,000 members and features on-site personal trainers, sports physicians, nutritionists, and physiotherapists who work closely with each member to design personalized programs aimed at achieving individual fitness goals.

Boll & Branch is a leading designer and retailer of home goods that are rooted in high-quality, sustainably-sourced materials. Recognized for its commitment to responsible practices, Boll & Branch is the largest consumer of Fair Trade Certified organic cotton and prioritizes the wellbeing of farmers and factory workers around the world. The company is one of the largest direct-to-consumer home brands in the U.S. and has become the most trusted bedding brand for millions of people.

Birkenstock is a leading global footwear brand with nearly 250 years of history and universally recognized for its iconic designs and contoured cork footbeds. To this day, Birkenstock proudly manufactures nearly all its products in-house across its owned manufacturing footprint in Germany using sustainable materials sourced across Europe.

Butternut is a fresh pet food brand in the U.K. that delivers health and happiness to dogs and their humans. It was founded in 2016 with a focus on providing natural, human-grade, and locally sourced ingredients in their recipes.

Canidae is a super-premium, natural dog and cat food brand striving to create a world of sustainable goodness for our pets and planet. For 25 years, Canidae has been on a mission to do better. Better for pets and better for us all. From the ingredients the Company sources to the people it partners with, Canidae is working to create a world of sustainable goodness for our pets and planet. The Company works hard to nurture the health of pets with wholesome, premium ingredients and recipes crafted for whole body health. And the Company nurtures the health of our planet through its investment in regenerative agriculture, planet-friendly packaging, and sustainable operations. Everything Canidae does results in a better product. A bowl full of goodness.

CantuStore is the leading omnichannel tire aftermarket distributor and retailer in Brazil, offering a differentiated value proposition through multiple sales channels fueled by a robust online strategy. Founded in 2006, CantuStore has been disrupting the fragmented and poorly served tire aftermarket category in Brazil by sourcing a broad portfolio from domestic and international manufacturers and selling to end consumers via its own e-commerce platform and marketplaces, fleet owners, and resellers. CantuStore has become the market leader driven by its unique omnichannel strategy, national presence, best assortment depth across almost all tire segments (e.g., cars, trucks, motorbikes), private label, and innovative value-add services such as tire installations.
A leading chain of dental clinics in Italy.

Cazoo is the UK's first fully end-to-end digital platform for consumers to buy high quality used cars. The platform allows customers to exchange old cars, access financing, and purchase a used car entirely online with nationwide delivery within 72 hours.

Luxury lifestyle dining and entertainment: restaurants, iconic rooftop bars, and club lounges/night clubs. Delivering “The Pursuit of Pleasure.” CÉ LA VI celebrates the pursuit of pleasure, passion, and play, and of living life to the fullest. Creating drama and inspired moments out of cuisine, mixology, music, culture and spectacular surroundings, CÉ LA VI is a world-class brand orchestrated with masterful precision and finesse, and time-honored Asian hospitality. The luxury lifestyle dining and entertainment brand currently has a presence in Singapore, Dubai, Taipei, as well as Tokyo, and plans to expand into other cosmopolitan cities across the world to cement its position as the region’s leading dining and entertainment venue. This is CÉ LA VI. This is living.

A leading multi-brand beauty and personal care company in Japan focused on haircare and skincare. Ci FLAVORS boasts a strong portfolio of products, particularly in the mid-end segment of the Japanese haircare market, which has been growing faster than other segments. These products are sold widely throughout the country, especially in drugstores, the dominant sales channel for the segment.

ClassPass is a leading modern-day fitness and wellness marketplace that connects its global membership base to over a million different classes through a single booking platform. It offers a wide range of digital and in-person classes and wellness experiences.

Consumer Safety Technology is a leading direct-to-consumer provider of driving safety technologies that prevent impaired driving and offer services to support individuals through the license restoration process. With a focus on preventing and discouraging impaired driving, CST aims to guide consumers through the license restoration process with its comprehensive offering of safety devices, health assessments, insurance brokerage, roadside assistance, and substance detection services.

Asia’s most celebrated Chinese restaurant chain. Founded in 1991 in Singapore, Crystal Jade is an award-winning Chinese cuisine brand with a large market presence, comprised of 100 outlets across Asia. The Group executes a 4-segment Chinese cuisine model which includes Fine, Family restaurants, Casual Dining and Bakery.

Founded in 2011, dentalcorp has grown to be Canada's largest network of dental practices. The Company's unprecedented strategic insights and expertise place dentist partners at the forefront of delivering optimal patient care. dentalcorp is focused on acquiring and partnering with leading, growth-oriented general and specialist dental clinics across Canada. The Company's unique value proposition allows dentist partners to retain their clinical and operating autonomy while dentalcorp inspires them to achieve ambitious personal and professional growth.

Despegar is the leading online travel company in Latin America, offering products from airlines, accommodation options, car rental agencies, and destination services suppliers. It has revolutionized the tourism industry through technology and operates in 20 countries in the region.

DIBS is about elevating beauty essentials for consumers who range from 0 to 100 in terms of makeup knowledge. An entirely new approach that takes the intimidation out of makeup with uncomplicated color combos and ingredients. The line was specifically built to be mistake-proof, multi-purpose, and stackable, enabling easy transformations that can be achieved by any consumer. From the carefully curated shade range to their effortless blendability, each product in the collection has been thoughtfully formulated to truly elevate the everyday.

Dragonfly is an ambitious team of entrepreneurs, analysts, and software engineers who acquire and develop standout ecommerce businesses. Launched in 2019 by MIT-trained engineers and serial entrepreneurs, Philip Butler and Jeremy Todd, Dragonfly acquires, incubates, and licenses fast-growing consumer brands and rapidly scales them in a digital-first environment. Since its founding, Dragonfly has developed proprietary algorithms and technologies to inform its acquisition strategy as well as in-house new product development and creative capabilities to build de novo brands and products at scale.

Drools is India's leading homegrown pet food brand dominating the value-for-money pet food segment with quality products in dog food, cat food, and treats. The company has a deep omni-channel presence reaching households across Tier II and III cities of India.

Leading global battery energy storage system (BESS) company founded in 2017 and headquartered in Suzhou, China. Develops products for residential, commercial, and recreational vehicle use. Experienced team of industry veterans with expertise in research and development, engineering, and manufacturing. Portfolio of high-quality BESS products sold in over 100 countries.
Eco is a digital wallet for saving and spending. It replaces checking accounts, credit cards, and more with a single product that rewards you every time you save, spend, or send your money.
Eighth Day is a beauty company that focuses on using ingredients native to human skin cells to promote natural healing mechanisms.

Elevate Beauty was founded to provide a high touch, value added approach to building iconic and enduring brands in the dynamic beauty market. We believe providing category knowledge and operational know-how early in a company's growth trajectory will elevate a brand's ability to breakthrough and generate deep consumer love.

Equinox is a pioneer in the luxury fitness industry and has grown into an unrivaled lifestyle brand. As an internationally recognized arbiter of luxury, we offer our members unparalleled, bespoke experiences in the fields of movement, nutrition and regeneration, and remain grounded by substance but elevated in style.

The leading laser hair removal destination in Brazil. Founded in 2002 by Ygor Moura, Tito Veiga Pinto, and Paulo Iasz de Morais. Espaçolaser has hundreds of owned and franchised stores across Brazil and is also present in Argentina, Chile, Colombia, and Paraguay. Mission is to provide health and wellness through the best hair removal technique using the Alexandrite laser technology with a cooling cryogen solution for comfort. Largest laser hair removal company in Brazil, serving over 4.2 million customers. Owns Estudioface for facial aesthetic services.

Innovation, research, magic and a refined artistic aestheticism run in ETRO’s DNA, reinterpreting tradition while drawing inspiration from the world of art and travel. Refined, classy and beautiful, ETRO products are a testimony of Italian craftsmanship. Unique collections, unrivalled quality and attention to detail entwine among the weaves of its iconic Paisley design. ETRO is a fashion house that has defined Italian style around the world since 1968. From research into textiles and attention to detail, Etro creates luxury clothing and accessories for men and women, where passion for travel and sartorial tradition are the key concepts of every collection. The iconic Paisley pattern, prints and jacquard weaves feature on outerwear, dresses, bags and shoes. The Maison's unique style is also expressed through a line of unisex fragrances featuring aromatic, floral, spicy and woody notes, and by a home accessories collection in which tradition blends with contemporary aesthetics.

A rapid-growing Japanese cosmetics brand that develops, manufactures, and sells ceramide based skincare products and mineral based make-up. ETVOS is a strongly positioned independent Japanese skincare and make-up brand that provides products in four categories: skin care, make-up, haircare, and baby-care. All products are developed by the company’s R&D center and manufactured in Japan. Japan has the highest per capita spend on cosmetics globally and there is a growing consumer need for natural, organic, mineral based cosmetics which ETVOS is well positioned to capture.

Everlane is a scaled, dual-gender direct-to-consumer apparel/accessories business leading in sustainability. It is a mission-driven company built on an ethos of exceptional quality, ethical practices, and 'Radical Transparency'. The brand offers sustainable, modern basics at accessible price points, sold predominantly online and through retail stores.

FEMME is a distinctive medical diagnostics company dedicated exclusively to women's health. With more than 40 years of experience, FEMME provides quality of life and well-being for women. The service offering is customized, combining modern medical equipment and comfort for female patients. The business has a specialized medical team with highly qualified personnel. FEMME has strong satisfaction ratings from patients, physicians, and payers, along with recent excellence awards from prestigious Brazilian organizations.

FlashParking is a leading parking technology company that is revolutionizing the transportation and mobility ecosystem. Founded in 2011 to perfect the parking experience, FlashParking has grown to serve thousands of operations, enterprise portfolios, and smart cities nationwide. Today, the company is enabling traditional parking assets to evolve into next-generation mobility hubs by implementing future-ready hardware and software infrastructure, a powerful business intelligence engine, and a robust partner ecosystem. FlashParking is the best parking solution for today and the only mobility solution for tomorrow.

India's largest integrated branded fashion company. Founded in 2012, FLFL owns and markets several fashion brands through exclusive brand outlets, department stores and multi brand outlets, as well as company-operated chains such as Central and Brand Factory. FLFL is a unique player in the Indian fashion industry due to its integrated 'design to distribution' model and presence across all key segments within the fashion industry. FLFL is an operating company of Future Group, a large Indian retail and fashion conglomerate.

Forter is the trust platform for digital commerce. We help leaders across industries approve more transactions, improve customer experience and reduce losses to fraud and abuse - by assessing trustworthiness accurately and in real-time.

Founders Table Restaurant Group launched in January 2020 to create, acquire, and cultivate innovative and profitable founder-led restaurant companies. Founders Table, which currently includes Chopt and Dos Toros, leans on digital and operational innovation to drive the growth of industry-leading culinary concepts.

Freetrade is an award-winning, commission-free investment platform that is designed to get everyone investing. Launched in 2018, Freetrade has brought commission-free investing to hundreds of thousands of investors, becoming one of the largest retail brokers in the UK. Freetrade is built for long-term investors, prioritizing education, clear and simple pricing, and putting its customers first.

Function of Beauty is the world leader in customizable beauty, with hair, skin, and body care products made for you (and only you). Function of Beauty is the leading customized beauty brand, providing you with truly individualized haircare, body care and skincare products.
hq: MIT engineers, cosmetic scientists, and developers

company_description: Functionalab Group is a leading platform and largest operator of premium medical aesthetics clinics in Canada, providing aesthetic services and skincare solutions in a world-class and modern environment with a patient-centric and doctor-led approach. Founded in 2009 and merged with FYihealth groupâs Medical Aesthetics Division in 2023, Functionalab Group has grown to become the largest network of premium medical aesthetics clinics in Canada, operating primarily under the Dermapure and ProjectSkin MD brands. The Company combines cutting-edge technologies and professional skincare solutions, including its proprietary skincare brand, Functionalab, to deliver effective and lasting results in a differentiated, high-end, and inspirational environment. Functionalab Groupâs brands have been developed and endorsed by dermatologists and skin health practitioners to offer the most innovative, science-based, and effective aesthetics solutions. The Company has a proven track record as a platform consolidator that has consistently delivered strong performance and growth.

Enhancing Lives by being patient-first and doctor-led is the heart of FYidoctors. Today, FYidoctors is the largest optometrist-owned eye care provider in the world. FYidoctors invests in the latest diagnostic equipment, manufactures its own Canadian-made lenses with industry-leading technology, and offers an extensive eyewear selection – all in support of patient health and happiness. FYidoctors’ belief that doctors should control the evolution of eye care has led to a revolution in the optometry industry and beyond. In line with its core values, FYidoctors is active in community support with its Enhancing Life Foundation.

Gadget Guard is the world’s first two-way protection company, dedicated to guarding humans from their devices and devices from their humans. Founded in Utah in 2009, Gadget Guard has always been involved in the mobile accessories industry. Today, they have stepped up as the world’s first two-way protection brand, specializing in using science-backed technologies to create device accessories that solve real world problems. Gadget Guard’s vision is to create a healthy relationship between humans and their tech.

One of the fastest growing advanced contemporary fashion brands in the dynamic global affordable luxury womenswear market. Founded in Copenhagen, Denmark in 2000, Ganni is a leading advanced contemporary fashion brand offering differentiated women’s ready-to-wear clothing. Ganni is one of the fastest growing brands in the global apparel space and has established an international presence through its owned stores and more than 400 premium retailers in 20 countries including Denmark, Norway, Sweden, the UK, Germany and the U.S. The brand has significant digital exposure and a unique style endorsed by key fashion opinion leaders and embraced by a quickly growing base of loyal customers.

A Gen Z-focused, data-driven, and fast-growing Chinese beverage company with leading position in the low-sugar, low-calorie categories. Genki is a Gen Z-focused, data-driven Chinese beverage company established in 2016. As a low-sugar, low-calorie innovator across multiple categories, Genki is currently the category leader in low-sugar, low-calorie sparkling water, milk tea, and RTD tea, which are available through key e-commerce platforms and ~700k POS across China. Run like a tech company, Genki outperforms in competition through significantly faster product innovation, deployment of proprietary data analytics tools, as well as social-first, Gen Z-focused marketing campaigns. In addition, Genki has established a health-oriented emotional connectivity with its consumers.

Getaway designs and operates "tiny house" rentals in beautiful rural areas just outside major cities. The company places their custom built homes, each between 160 and 200 square feet, on secluded land in wooded, natural landscapes and rents them out by the night to those looking to easily escape their daily routines and experience the restorative benefits of nature. Consumers reserve their "getaways" online and the company takes care of the details from start to finish, providing guests a turnkey experience to restore balance to their busy lives. The company boasts a strong social media presence and loyal customer base, with broad appeal across geographies and demographics.

GetYourGuide (GYG) is one of the leading companies disrupting the large and rapidly growing tours & activities market. Headquartered in Berlin, GYG is Europe's leading online travel platform focused on identifying high quality tours & activities suppliers to offer consumers tickets for tours, attractions and activities worldwide through its web and mobile applications. By partnering with high quality suppliers, GYG enables suppliers to reach more volume in a short period and provides consumers a highly curated set of options. GYG's target market, tours & activities, is large and growing. This market is ripe for disruption by the digital channel as only a small percentage of spend is online today compared to leisure accommodations.

Leading Italian luxury footwear brand, endorsed by many celebrities and fashionistas. The high-end fashion shoe designer and manufacturer distributes its products globally through mono and multi brand stores, under the 'Giuseppe Zanotti Design' and 'Giuseppe Zanotti' labels. Popular among celebrities and fashionistas, the Giuseppe Zanotti Design brand has positioned itself as one of the top designers in the world, and continues to experience strong growth across its footwear and accessory lines. Transcending its origins as a women-focused brand, the company launched a successful men's division – specializing in both casual and formal shoes.

GlossGenius is a gateway for entrepreneurship, enabling tens of thousands of small businesses across the US beauty and wellness landscape to succeed with elegant, intuitive software that abstracts their entire back office. GlossGenius is the fastest growing vertical software payments company powering tens of thousands of businesses and billions of dollars of activity across the beauty and wellness space.

Iconic Spanish casual dining concept, offering tasty and fresh gourmet burgers in an enjoyable ambiance. Founded in 2013, Goiko is one of the fastest growing casual dining restaurant concept in Spain, recognized for its tasty products, its efficient and enjoyable service as well as its good ambiance. The company has become one of the most iconic restaurant brands in Spain in less than five years and enjoys a strong consumer recognition primarily thanks to its distinctive natural and good quality burgers. Goiko is also a leading restaurant chain on social media with a large Instagram follower base very actively engaged with the brand.

GOODLES is reinventing the multi-billion dollar prepared pasta aisle that hasn't seen real innovation in decades, under the belief that mac and cheese is more than a childhood memory; it's a lifelong food that can be delicious and nutritious. Jen Zeszut Founder and CEO GOODLES are noodles, made gooder. From its launch in late 2021, GOODLES has challenged category thinking – defying the stereotype that mac and cheese is only for kids – and instead has introduced a line of products boasting premium nutrients, delicious taste, and a daring range of sophisticated flavors. GOODLES eliminates the need to choose between great taste and nutrition by combining sophisticated ingredients, protein, fiber, nutrients from plants and complex flavors that taste incredibly delicious. Today, the Company sells its growing assortment of delicious and nutritious boxed mac and cheese and pasta products across a wide range of retailers across the country, including Target, Whole Foods, Albertsons, HEB, Publix, Wegman's, Amazon, and on GOODLES.com.

Grupo MYT offers innovative dining experiences across four distinct cuisine genres. Founded in 1996 by brothers Carlos, Alfredo and Andres Mier y TerÃ¡n with a single creperie cart, the company has become one of the largest operators of organically developed restaurants in Mexico. Grupo MYT designs, builds and operates distinctive casual restaurant brands in Mexico. The company currently operates restaurants across four different concepts, each curated and managed by a multidisciplinary team of nearly a thousand talented, passionate and impact-driven individuals focused on executing a superior level of hospitality and service. The company's casual dining brands include: Moshi Moshi, an innovative Japanese casual dining restaurant; La Imperial, a polished casual Mexican restaurant and cantina; Cocina Abierta, a full-service multi-genre food hall; and La Crepe Parisiene, a kiosk concept offering freshly made sweet and savory crepes.

Leading menswear fashion group in China with 4 uniquely positioned brands. Established in 2007, GXG has grown into a leading menswear fashion group in China with powerful online presence, extensive POS coverage and highly recognized brand name. Currently GXG has a portfolio of 4 uniquely positioned brands, including GXG, gxg.jeans, gxg.kids and Yatlas. With original design and strong brand awareness, GXG distributes through leading shopping malls and department stores with over 2,000 stores, as well as through leading third party online platforms such as Tmall, JD.com and VIPShop.
Rapidly-growing personal care company focused on children's skincare needs

Hanna Andersson is a leading premium children's apparel and lifestyle brand known for its superior quality, classic styling, and unique Swedish-inspired designs. The company's products cater to boys, girls, and infants from newborn to 12 years old, offering a broad range of clothing that emphasizes quality, durability, and style.

The pioneer and #1 premium tea drink chain in China Heytea has redefined the ~5,000-year-old traditional Chinese tea market since its establishment in 2012, creating the premium tea drink chain category, and has grown remarkably under the leadership of visionary founder Neo Nie. The company constantly introduces innovative flavors to delight customers, using the freshest ingredients that are available during each season, and its limited-edition series are especially popular. Committed to continuously serving the best to consumers and fostering emotional connections with them, Neo and his management team have meticulously built the Heytea brand to stand for aspiration, innovation, and quality.

Strategically located property in the luxurious Hong Kong Central district, acquired by Chelsfield and L Catterton Real Estate. Repositioning plan includes redemising the space into several retail units to create a dynamic mix.

Homebase is the everything app for hourly teams, offering employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, HR, and more, with an emphasis on businesses in core consumer categories like restaurants, retail, and fitness. More than 100,000 small businesses rely on Homebase to make work radically easy and give their teams superpowers. Homebase tracked over one billion hours for over 2.5 million workers last year.

The Honest Company is a digitally native, mission-driven company created by Jessica Alba to provide safe, natural products through engaging, personal relationships with millennial women. It is the #1 brand in the fast-growing natural segment of the U.S. baby category with diapers, personal care, and wipes as its largest product lines. The Honest Co.'s 'clean beauty' line provides consumers with Better for You beauty products that also deliver high-performance results and innovative design. The Company's products are available through its direct-to-consumer channel and through leading North American retailers, including Target, Walmart, CVS, Amazon, and Costco, and select Douglas locations throughout Europe.

At Hopdoddy, we will always serve you the freshest, natural & most delicious ingredients. Every day we grind our beef patties from hormone-free, antibiotic-free, all-natural Black Angus. We bake our buns from scratch & we cut our fries from select Kennebec potatoes. Founded in 2010 by four experienced restaurateurs, Hopdoddy was created to "express the perfect union of burgers and beer." Hopdoddy is distinguished by its fresh, all-natural and hormone free "Crafted Burgers," its array of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks, and its unique service model in which guests order at a counter and then proceed to a reserved table where their food is brought to them and treated to a full table service experience from that point on. Since its inception, Hopdoddy has received significant press recognition, including recognition as Zagat's "Best Things We Ate" and "Best Burgers in 25 cities in America," one of CNBC's "10 Brands to Watch," one of "12 Small Chains that Might Someday Dominate the World" and one of celebrity chef Rachel Ray's "Top 10 Best Burgers in America."

Hungryroot is pioneering an entirely new way to grocery shop. They leverage proprietary technology to predict and deliver groceries and recipes that best suit each individual customer's needs and goals. The result is a customer-first, curated experience that reduces the average time consumers spend grocery shopping from two to three hours a week, to just two to three minutes. Hungryroot does the work for customers so they don't have to.

Founded by Bruce Smith, a life-long entrepreneur and US National Team rowing coach, Hydrow is on a mission to bring the soul-enriching sport of rowing to homes everywhere. Rowing is widely regarded as the best form of exercise, engaging 86% of your body’s muscles and burning more calories per minute than any other exercise all while minimizing impact on your joints. Hydrow has developed a connected rowing machine that streams live and on-demand workouts led by world class athletes directly from the water. The Hydrow rower is manufactured with commercial grade durability and designed for easy assembly and storage. The Hydrow live outdoor reality (LOR)™ experience brings everything together: the best form of exercise, new live classes every day with great music, and an engaging workout experience that makes you feel like part of a community.

"The food your pet would make for themselves, â¦ya know, if they could.â "I and Love and You" is a pet food brand driven by the belief that ultra-premium, pet specialty quality products should be made accessible to everybody. Founded in Boulder in 2010, the vibrant and innovative brand marries high quality, natural ingredients together with functional benefits, providing "our plus-oneâs" with high protein and healthy digestion without any artificial preservatives or fillers. The brand offers a wide range of products for both cats and dogs in ecommerce, grocery, and mass channels, meeting the customer where they want to purchase.

IAFSTORE is Italy’s leading DTC platform in sports nutrition and food supplements offering a wide portfolio of proprietary and third-party brands dedicated to fitness enthusiasts and athletes looking for premium quality and performance. Founded in 2007, IAFSTORE is Italy’s leading direct-to-consumer platform in sports nutrition, food supplements, OTC, and healthy products. Born as an e-commerce distributor of third-party products, in 2012 IAFSTORE launched its first owned brand, YAMAMOTO, which quickly became a market leader thanks to its superior quality and proprietary formulations. Today IAFSTORE has seven branded product lines under the brand names Yamamoto Nutrition, Yamamoto Research, IAFSTORE, OneProtein, Alphazer, Yamamoto Active Wear, and Smile Crunch, offering a broad selection of high-quality supplements and functional foods to thousands of active lifestyle and health-conscious consumers in Italy and abroad.

ICON Health & Fitness is a global health and fitness leader and owner of iFit, NordicTrack, ProForm, Freemotion and other fitness brands. Based in Logan, Utah, the 43-year old company has a multi-decade heritage of innovation, quality and profitability.

iFIT Health & Fitness is an integrated health and fitness platform, designed to connect proprietary software, experiential content, and interactive hardware to deliver a connected fitness experience. The company has a growing community of more than 5 million members and 1 million+ subscribers in over 120 countries. iFIT Health & Fitness brands include iFIT, NordicTrack, ProForm, and Freemotion, offering a wide range of fitness modalities and interactive experiences.

Innis & Gunn is the largest craft beer brand in Scotland, ranking 2nd in the UK, with a strong international presence. Founded in 2003, Innis & Gunn is famous for its selection of beers aged inside oak casks, creating a differentiated taste with a variety of finishes such as rum or whiskey. Innis & Gunn also offers a full portfolio of new styles including lager, IPA, alcohol-free, and launches 5 to 9 limited editions a year. The beers are distributed through a vast network of establishments in the UK and several countries including the U.S., Canada, Sweden, and France. In 2015, the Company opened its first Beer Kitchen in Edinburgh, an award-winning bar-restaurant concept, and added several more in Scotland.

Intercos is the leading global supplier and strategic innovation partner to the color cosmetics and skincare industry with research centers, production sites, and marketing offices in North America, South America, Europe, and Asia. Intercos develops and manufactures cosmetics for well-known brands in the industry.

Irene Forte Skincare is the Italian skincare brand at the forefront of the 'Natural Science' movement. Based on 35 years of research in the medical use of plant extracts to treat skin conditions, the eponymous line includes novel ingredients and advanced actives which have shown profound results in independent clinical and user trials. The core ingredients are harvested at the founder's organic farm in Sicily, and all products are certified vegan. In recognition of its high ethical standards, Irene Forte Skincare has achieved B-Corp status.

Jio Platforms is India's largest telecom service provider, offering a digital ecosystem comprising network, devices, applications, content, platforms, and services. It focuses on providing high-quality and affordable digital services across India.
John Hardy is an inspiring brand rich with tradition that is evidenced through our distinctive jewelry and undeniable commitments to positive social and environment change.

A leading French casualwear brand, with the power to span across categories, geographies, and generations. JOTT is a leading French urban casualwear brand offering functional, comfortable, and versatile clothes, most notably its distinct line of light down jackets. With significant brand awareness and visibility in Europe, JOTT currently distributes its comprehensive collections of casual outerwear and accessory products through a network of distinctive and colourful concept stores as well as wholesale clients. The brand has been a forerunner in the advent of the premium down jacket with its stylish, high-quality, functional and affordable products which are perfectly suited for today's versatile way of life. JOTT is an inclusive brand catering for all occasions, ages and lifestyles which now ambitions to become a global champion in the light outerwear jacket segment.

JustFoodForDogs is the world's first "pet food kitchen" where human-grade meats and vegetables are turned into healthy meals for dogs and cats. Founded in 2010 by Shawn Buckley, the company aims to elevate the nutritional quality of traditional dog food.

Kettle's roots in artisan cooking - scratch-made stocks, hand-chopped herbs, and the highest quality ingredients - are complimented by industry-leading manufacturing technology and an endless pursuit of consistently excellent products crafted at scale. Founded in 1986, Kettle Cuisine is a leading wholesale manufacturer of artisan-quality, fresh prepared food solutions at scale for restaurant and grocery customers nationwide. Kettle leverages its unique technical manufacturing expertise to deliver a wide variety of value-added, innovative fresh prepared food solutions, including soup, sauces, sous-vide proteins, and ready-to-eat skillet meals. The Company has developed a reputation as the leading private label specialist in the scaled fresh food solutions category, having grown to become the largest producer of fresh soup in North America.

Kodiak is a leading brand in the better-for-you breakfast and snacking categories, with a portfolio that is whole-grain and powered by protein. Founded in 1982, Kodiak is a high-growth food business built on a mission to inspire healthier eating and active living. Kodiak's 'Nourishment For Today's Frontier' brand promise comes to life through a 100% whole-grain product portfolio that is powered by protein and delivers on a delicious taste profile. Beginning with its breakout Power Cakes pancake mix, Kodiak has succeeded across multiple categories and is now the #2 brand in pancake mix, the #2 brand in frozen waffles, the #2 brand in Oatmeal, and a scaled brand across numerous other categories. Kodiak resonates especially with a Millennial / Gen Z audience and is one of the fastest-growing food brands in the U.S.
Up and coming sustainable lifestyle direct-to-consumer brand targeting the global market

Kopari is a beauty brand that specializes in coconut oil-based beauty products. The brand integrates cutting-edge chemistry and natural ingredients to enhance the benefits of coconut oil and provide multi-purpose formulations for effective results. Kopari uses 100% organic coconut oil and avoids harmful ingredients like sulfates, silicones, and parabens.

Little Moons is the leading European mochi ice cream brand, famous for its 'ice cream from another world'. It produces delicious bite-sized artisanal gelato ice cream treats cased in a soft, chewy mochi dough. Little Moons offers a range of exciting flavors and continues to innovate with distinctive new product creations. Products are made in-house at the Company's bespoke facility in the UK, using the Wong family's 30-year-old recipe. Little Moons products are sold via retail, food-service, sushi kiosks, and the at-home grocery channel. Products are widely distributed in the UK, France, and Germany, and the brand is growing across other international markets.

Bodegas Luigi Bosca was established in Mendoza by the Arizu Family in 1901. For 122 years, they have continued the founders' tradition of making wines of excellence, passed over their knowledge through for generations, and achieved a leading position as the global standard for Argentine wines. Luigi Bosca is renowned for the consistent quality of its wines, a deep understanding of the terroir, and the continuous quest for excellence through innovation and technology. The Winery is a leading player in the great wines segment of the Argentine domestic market, while it has also achieved a sound and valued position in global markets.
Maria Nila is a leading 100% vegan and award-winning professional haircare brand founded in 1999 in Sweden. The brand focuses on providing cruelty-free and sustainable haircare products.

Marubi is a multibrand skincare company that operates two uniquely positioned skincare brands in Marubi and Haruki. Marubi targets the mid-to-high end market segment within the price point of USD 30-60 (age 28-48), while Haruki targets the younger mid-market segment (age 18-38) with products at the USD 6-30 price point. The company distributes through nearly 12,000 points of sale throughout China, including cosmetic stores, department stores, beauty spas, and e-Commerce.

MERIT is minimalist beauty, created to reimagine luxury by making it clean, well-edited and accessible – essentials that have earned a place on your vanity. MERIT was created to reimagine luxury beauty by making it clean and accessible, providing a beautiful brand experience through its curated offering of well-edited essentials. By taking a holistic approach to responsible luxury, MERIT creates products that are safe for body, skin, and planet. The award-winning brand continues to launch products that make you look like you – simplifying what it means to get ready.

company_name: Master Trades Group (fka LTP Home Services Group)
company_description: Founded in 1996 by Len Bush as "Len the Plumber," Master Trades Group is a leading residential services platform with a specialization in plumbing and HVAC services, operating across the Mid-Atlantic and Southeast regions under various brands. Master Trades Group (fka LTP Home Services Group) is a rapidly growing plumbing and HVAC platform with a playbook to drive value creation through M&A and greenfield expansion. The Company is differentiated as a premium operator with an outstanding reputation for quality, allowing it to take meaningful share via organic growth and build a defensible market position within core regions. The Company has a proven track record as an industry innovator and platform consolidator that has consistently delivered strong performance and rapid growth over multiple decades. Master Trades Group is keenly focused on customer satisfaction while striving to be the employer of choice for technicians.

A neighborhood dedicated to innovative fashion, design, architecture, and dining experiences in Miami. Developed by Dacra and L Catterton Real Estate, it is a prime retail project with retail, restaurants, art galleries, and hotel spaces.

Founded in 2012 by Kevin Lavelle, Mizzen+Main is a digitally native designer, wholesaler and retailer of American-made, performance-focused menswear. The Company's highly differentiated offerings, which include dress and sport shirts, chinos, polos, henleys, sweaters and pullovers, use high-tech, innovative materials that are wrinkle-free, machine washable, and have stretch and moisture wicking capabilities. With a fiercely loyal following that includes professional athletes such as J.J. Watt and several others, Mizzen+Main has experienced rapid growth. In addition to a successful online presence, Mizzen+Main has a strong wholesale presence through select men's retailers including Dillard's and Nordstrom, among others.

China’s leading aggregator of third-party Amazon vendors. Nebula Brands is uniquely poised to tap into the growth of the Amazon marketplace driven by China-based third-party vendors. The company has a strong team in China with deep market knowledge and experience in sourcing, underwriting, and operations.

NotCo is a highly disruptive food-tech company that leverages machine-learning to develop delicious, sustainable, plant-based products. Founded in 2015 in Santiago, Chile, NotCo is a leading food-tech company that leverages artificial intelligence to accurately develop superior plant-based products. The Company uses machine learning algorithms to accelerate the Companyâs R&D efforts by understanding food at a molecular level in order to perfectly mimic traditionally animal-based products. NotCo is the fastest growing company of plant-based category in Latin America. The brand is distinguished by its delicious products, proprietary technology and environmental sustainability. NotCo's key products include NotMilk, NotBurger, NotIceCream and NotMayo which are available through key retailers and leading food service chains across Latin America and North America

ODDITY is a consumer-tech company which builds and scales digital-first brands to disrupt the offline-dominated beauty and wellness industries. The company's first brand, IL MAKIAGE, defines and builds the future of beauty by using ODDITY's unparalleled technology to connect people with superior, painstakingly tested, beauty products. Since the brand's launch, IL MAKIAGE has converted millions of consumers from shopping for beauty products in stores to making purchases online and disrupted the industry in the process. ODDITY launched its second brand, SpoiledChild, in February 2022 to disrupt the wellness industry with personalized hair and skin products.

Utilizing the latest technology and prioritizing innovation and quality, OdontoCompany is focused on making dental care accessible to all Brazilians. OdontoCompany has grown to be the largest dental clinic network in the world, offering high quality and affordable dental care across Brazil. OdontoCompany has more than 2,400 dental clinics operating throughout the country under it's three brands: OdontoCompany, OrthoDontic and Oral Sin - which offer orthodontics, dentistry, aesthetics, endodontics and implants services.

Ole & Steen is a leading premium bakery and food-service chain in Denmark with >100 stores in its home market, and a growing presence in the UK and US. It operates a premium concept focusing on high-quality artisanal breads, cakes, pastries, teas, and coffee. The business model includes in-house bakery production and a scalable roll-out strategy, professionalizing the Danish fresh bakery industry. The brand has a strong presence in Denmark, the UK with 20 stores, and the US.

Pain Doctor is a leading pain management company that provides standardized care and high quality service for patients in pain. The Company offers a full suite of services and treatment plans that are tailored to each patient, and include multi-disciplinary medical evaluations, orthotics, MRI, steroid injections, behavioral therapy, acupuncture and more. Pain Doctor operates pain clinics and surgical centers and is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona.

PatientPoint Health Technologies is a tech-enabled patient engagement company that aims to improve doctor-patient interactions. It was formed in March 2021 through the combination of PatientPoint and Outcome Health, impacting 750 million patient visits annually.

Partner Pet is a leading domestic premium pet food brand in China. It is the pioneer of biologically appropriate raw food (BARF) offerings in China and is considered a BARF specialist. The products are known for their palatability and balanced nutritional profiles, with best-in-class conversion and repurchase rates. Customers are strong advocates of the brand. Partner Pet is vertically integrated and has an extensive presence across offline and online channels in China.

Leading player in the denim and sportswear category. Founded in 1973 in London, Pepe Jeans Group is a leading global player in the lifestyle fashion sector with a strong presence in Europe and a material presence in India. Through two main owned brands, Pepe Jeans and Hackett, Pepe Jeans Group offers a solid portfolio of complementary and high-quality products across various fashion segments such as casual & formal wear, footwear, handbags, eyewear, and other accessories. Pepe Jeans Group currently operates in Europe and Asia through a variety of distribution forms including wholesale, own retail network, distributors, and e-commerce, along with agency and licensing agreements.
Petlove is the leading online pet shop and ecosystem in Brazil, offering a complete pet retail platform and various services for pet owners and veterinarians.

Premier global diversified healthcare company with leading market positions in the diabetes management, life science and diagnostics, and healthcare services businesses. Incorporated in 2014, PHC Holdings Corporation is a global healthcare company with subsidiaries including PHC Corporation, Ascensia Diabetes Care Holdings AG, Epredia, and LSI Medience Corporation. Committed to its corporate mission that states, âWe contribute to the health of society through our diligent efforts to create healthcare solutions that have a positive impact and improve the lives of people,â the company provides value-added products and services across diabetes management, life sciences and diagnostics globally, and healthcare services in Japan.

PIADA Italian Street Food is an authentic fast-casual restaurant chain based in Columbus, Ohio. The Company serves made to order Piadas (thin crust dough, baked on a stone grill, then hand rolled with fresh authentic ingredients), Pasta Bowls and Chopped Salads.

With a 100% made in Italy design and production, Pibiplast's products, such as mascaras and lip glosses, are behind the success of some of the world's most renowned beauty and personal care brands, as well as a growing number of emerging 'indie' brands. Founded in the '50s, Pibiplast is a Italian manufacturer of primary packaging for the make-up and skincare industries. Successful strategic acquisitions and important investments in state of-the-art production technologies have enabled the company to become one of the leading cosmetics packaging supplier in Europe in terms of product quality, depth of catalogue and flexibility. The company was a first-mover in adopting environmentally-friendly packaging solutions, having gained a strong edge compared to the market norm in terms of use of fully recyclable and recycled products.

One of the world's top designers and manufacturers of super yachts. The company was founded in 1965 in Plymouth, UK. Princess Yachts International is one of the world's leading designer and manufacturer of luxury super yachts with a well-established position in the mid to large-sized yacht market. It offers its yachts through its network of 50 exclusive distributors world-wide.

Planted produces delicious meat from alternative proteins, focusing on the perfect bite. Inspired by nature, the company pioneers a novel biostructuring approach that combines protein structuring and biotechnology. Using various proprietary technologies, Planted designs and structures alternative proteins in any size, shape, and fibrous texture and is convinced that biostructured proteins will outperform animal meat in the future in terms of taste, sustainability, health, efficiency and price. Planted is committed to using only clean and natural ingredients and no additives in all its products - making it a healthy and sustainable option for all. Truly better than animal meat.
The Protein Bar was founded in 2009 with a mission to change how people eat on the go, offering a selection of protein shakes, quinoa bowls, salads and wraps.

Public Goods is a digitally-native, mission-driven company that provides a broad assortment of everyday essentials at affordable prices. The Company’s product offering is designed to be clean, sustainable, and ethically sourced with a simple, beautiful aesthetic. By offering only one high-quality version of every essential product through its online and wholesale channels, Public Goods streamlines the purchase decision-making process and offers consumers a unique value proposition centered on convenience and accessibility.

Leading domestic premium pet food brand in China. Pure & Natural is a leading domestic brand in China's premium pet food market, which is benefitting from favorable macro trends such as rising disposable incomes and the increasing humanization of pets. It has grown since its founding in 2009 to become the country's top domestic premium dog food brand and is also an up-and-coming domestic premium cat food brand. Providing balanced nutrition and strong functional benefits, it enjoys best-in-class conversion and repurchase rates, and customers are strong advocates of the brand. It is also vertically integrated, with a robust supply chain and an extensive presence across offline and online channels in China.

A leading Argentinian lifestyle brand with growing presence across Latin America. Founded in 1999 in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Rapsodia offers a boho-chic, romantic style with an eclectic product portfolio inspired by different cultures, art, music, and world travel.

Founded in 2020 and based in Berlin, Razor is one of the leading, fastest-growing, and most profitable online marketplace aggregators globally. The Company has acquired +100 assets, curating a strong portfolio across their core categories (home & living, toys & gifts, outdoor, and sports & lifestyle), diversified across +200 brands, geographies, and channels. Razor has consolidated as one of the leading global platforms in the space, by developing remarkable scale and operating capabilities, maintaining robust growth rates, and achieving healthy profitability levels in a challenging macro context. In December 2022, Razor announced its acquisition of Valoreo, the leading, next-generation online marketplace aggregator, which focuses on investing, operating, and scaling digital brands in Latin America. L Catterton originally invested in Valoreo in February 2022, and on the back of its strong tech capabilities and its robust fulfillment platform, Valoreo immediately became an ideal entry point for Razor, in its expansion strategy into Latin America - the fastest growing e-commerce market globally.

RealTruck, Inc. is the premier vertically integrated truck, JeepÂ® and off-road parts and accessories company in North America.Â Headquartered in Ann Arbor, Mich. with over 5,000 employees and 35 locations across North America, we are an innovative market leading online retailer and manufacturer. Realtruck.com is the ultimate source and digital destination for those who love and live a real truck lifestyle. Fueled by our customer-first mindset, we continuously design, develop, manufacture, and sell industry-defining products with more than 570 patents and growing. Our portfolio of 28 powerhouse product brands are #1 or #2 (in U.S. market share) in each of our primary categories. Our extensive omni-channel approach allows us to serve customers wherever they are through RealTruck.com or the Truck Hero Pro Channel, which includes more than 12,000 dealer locations and automotive (OEM) partnerships. RealTruck, Inc. is engineered to deliver a seamless customer journey from idea to installation.

We’re talking live, active cultures with organic acids and antioxidants so you can high-five your gut on the daily. And with no sugar and no alcohol, these small batch, long-age brewed booches can chill in or out of the fridge. Remedy Drinks was launched in 2012 by fermentation fanatics Sarah and Emmet Condon in their Melbourne, Australia kitchen. With the vision to make healthy beverages tasty and convenient, and just overall better, Remedy Drinks offers a range of delicious and healthy no sugar, live-cultured kombuchas, mixers, sparkling apple cider vinegar, and clean energy drinks, all chock full of organic acids and antioxidants. No sugar means Remedy Drinks' raw and unpasteurized, strong cultures are able to stay live throughout shelf life, with no risk of fermentation, allowing them to be stable both in or out of the fridge.

Restaurant365 is an industry leading all-in-one, cloud-based accounting, inventory, scheduling, payroll, and HR solution developed specifically for restaurants. R365's restaurant enterprise management software simplifies day-to-day management for operators, allowing them to control food costs and optimize labor. Integrations and open APIs enable Restaurant365 to connect with other systems including POS providers, vendors, and banks. The result is accurate, timely reporting that provides a clear and complete view of their businesses.

Royalmount is a new generation, large scale and entertainment driven destination, strategically located in Montreal. Royalmount aims to become the new Montreal âmidtownâ L Catterton Real Estate is teaming up with Carbonleo to bring the next-generation of mixed-use developments to Montreal through the launch of Royalmount. The project, due to open by the end of 2022, will combine world-class retail, extensive dining and entertainment options, 5-star hotels and prime office space across more than 330,000 sqm. As a new and exciting lifestyle destination in the iconic city of Montreal, Royalmount will attract both local and international visitors by re-inventing retail with its luxury rows, international flagships and independent boutiques, while also providing an unrivaled family-oriented shopping experience.

In the spring of 2018, music and fashion icon Rihanna embarked on her newest venture: lingerie designer. Inspired to create a line of intimates that complements a variety of shades and shapes, Savage X Fenty celebrates fearlessness, confidence, and inclusivity. In partnership with a team assembled from the industry's elite, the label has disrupted and redefined the marketplace with its accessible price point and extensive assortment. "We want to make people look good and feel good," explains Rihanna, who approaches Savage X with the same mentality she does all her projects—to make something new and fresh that everyone can relate to and feel confident in. "We want you to feel sexy and have fun doing it."

Secoo is the largest high-end e-commerce platform for luxury products and lifestyle services in Asia. It offers an unparalleled selection of authentic upscale products and lifestyle services on its integrated online and offline shopping platform. Secoo provides more than 300,000 SKUs from over 3,000 global and domestic brands. It also offers unique credit card and financing solutions as part of the VIP experience. Secoo has 10 offline Experience Centers in key cities, an authentication center, and the world's largest luxury products maintenance center.

SellerX is Europe's leading aggregator of third-party e-commerce businesses, building category-winning brands by acquiring and scaling third-party Amazon FBA and other e-commerce businesses. The company operates a number of brands across multiple verticals and applies strong operational expertise to manage and scale its portfolio of brands.

Sendcloud is an all-in-one shipping platform for e-commerce businesses that want to scale. Sendcloud's mission is to empower online retailers to compete by optimizing the full shipping journey from checkout to returns. The Company's solution turns e-commerce logistics from a bottleneck into an accelerator, making shipping a competitive advantage.

Snap Kitchen is a Texas-based retail concept and meal delivery service that specializes in providing nutritious, ready-to-eat meals. They offer a wide range of chef-crafted dishes, tailored to various dietary preferences such as keto, paleo, and vegetarian. With a focus on quality ingredients and convenient options, Snap Kitchen aims to make healthy eating accessible and hassle-free for busy individuals.

The leading beauty and personal care omnichannel platform in Southeast Asia. Founded in 2015 as a specialty beauty e-commerce platform, Sociolla has grown rapidly to become the #1 specialty beauty omnichannel retailer and ecosystem in Indonesia. Given the Company's strong resonance with consumers and brand principals alike, the Company is well positioned to benefit from structural growth trends and entry barriers to become the leading beauty platform in Southeast Asia. As a regional pioneer in online specialty retail, Sociolla commands strong engagement and advocacy in the category through its integrated ecosystem across Sociolla, Soco, Beauty Journal, Lilla, and SDI platforms. The beauty and personal care category continues to see increasing penetration around the region with greater options, premium products, and improved accessibility both online and offline. This investment will provide more Gen-Z and Millennial consumers with access to Sociolla's trusted and curated high-quality beauty and personal care brands in Indonesia and Vietnam, empowering its loyal consumer base to look and feel better.
The redevelopment of an existing enclosed mall into an iconic mixed-use asset, creating an exciting lifestyle experience in the prime location of South Bay.

Sploot Veterinary Care is a veterinary care company that aims to empower pet parents on their journey to providing the best veterinary care for their furry family members. At the core of its mission is the creation of an unparalleled professional environment that enables veterinary professionals to thrive, ensuring exceptional service standards. Sploot provides a range of primary and urgent care services focused on providing a nurturing environment for pets and pet parents alike. The company is transforming the veterinary care experience through holistic investment in the pet parent experience and constant innovation in its operating model to provide the most convenient, easily accessed, and high-quality care.

St. Marche delivers a superior, innovative shopping experience to the food retail segment in Brazil under its two brands. The group was founded in 2002 by Bernardo Ouro Preto and Victor Leal with the opening of the first store under the brand St. Marche. In November 2016, the group closed on a partnership with L Catterton, with 18 stores under the St. Marche brand and one Emporio Santa Maria store. St. Marche attracts customers with its pleasant shopping environment in convenient locations, offering outstanding customer service, high quality products and a wide selection of uniquely curated merchandise. The company prioritizes proximity, convenience, product quality and an impeccable customer service, positioning St. Marche as the preferred supermarket in customers’ minds. St. Marche’s team of gastronomic curators are always leading the market in Sao Paulo in offering the most innovative products and currently boasts a product assortment of 10,000 items. In 2007, the group acquired Empório Santa Maria, a traditional premium emporium which inspires its customers with new and exclusive products from all over Brazil and the world. The brand is a destiny for those who seek a beautiful environment and personalized differentiated services. At the store, besides the emporium, customers can find a cafeteria (Paneria) and one of the best Japanese restaurants of the city (Sushi Bar).

One of India's largest and fastest-growing omnichannel beauty companies. Driven by consumers who are increasingly making cosmetics and skincare a part of their daily repertoire and experimenting with different types of products, India's beauty and personal care market is rapidly expanding, with SUGAR Cosmetics well positioned to benefit. The company has an extensive portfolio of high-quality products that resonate with consumers, a loyal customer base with whom it has developed lasting emotional connections, as well as a proven ability to attract and retain shoppers across the entire spectrum from metros to Tier II and III cities in the country.

Founded in 1999 by Susana Balbo, Argentina's first and most famous female winemaker, Susana Balbo Wines is one of the leading export-focused wineries in Argentina. Susana was the first woman to graduate as a winemaker in Argentina and worked with several of the most renowned wineries in the country prior to starting her eponymous winery. Susana Balbo Wines is a leading export-focused winery located in the Mendoza wine region of Argentina. Susana Balbo and the winery are known for a modern, balanced approach to winemaking, including a strong balance between reds, whites, and rosés. Susana Balbo's wines consistently receive some of the highest ratings in their respective categories from the world's most prestigious wine publications. Susana Balbo Wines produces wines under four major labels (Crios, BenMarco, Susana Balbo, Nosotros) positioned in the premium, super premium, ultra premium, and iconic categories.

Tally Health is a consumer biotechnology company founded to change the way we age. Co-founded by Dr. David Sinclair, who is also a scientific advisor to Tally Health, the company’s proprietary diagnostic test and individualized interventions give members the science-backed tools to live healthier, for longer. Tally Health is changing our relationship with health and aging and starting a new movement – where we think less about aging, and more about living.

Founded in 2014 by a NASA architect, Taxa is an outdoor lifestyle company that creates high-performance, hyper-durable, multi-functional camping machines designed to connect people with the outdoors and enable shared adventures. The company's mobile habitats are built from premium, eco-friendly, and high-performance materials and cater to customers ranging from first-time campers to experienced outdoor explorers. Taxa's mobile habitats are designed to facilitate off-the-grid adventures and transform the way people live, learn, and play outside.

Fast-growing e-bike company with an international footprint spanning Europe and Asia. Tenways is headquartered in the Netherlands, with research, production, branding, sales, and distribution operations across Europe, as well as specialized engineering talent and an extensive network of leading e-bike frame and component suppliers in Asia. Known for their smooth riding experience, responsiveness, relatively light weight, ergonomic design, long battery life, quiet motor, and attractive appearance. Tenways e-bikes have won overwhelmingly positive reviews from everyday users and endorsements from key influencers.

ThirdLove is a digitally native intimates brand that provides a great-fitting, high-quality bra to every woman. It offers signature half-cup bra sizes and algorithm-based sizing technology for a precise fit. The design process leverages big data to create proprietary cup molds based on real women's measurements. The products feature innovations in foam, wire, and fabric for optimal comfort.

Thorne HealthTech is a leader in developing personalized approaches to health and wellness. Thorne HealthTech is a leading science-driven wellness company that is committed to revolutionizing the way individuals approach their well-being. Thorne leverages cutting-edge science and research to develop premium dietary supplements and personalize health solutions. Thorne's personalized supplement and testing division leverages clinical science, biometric testing, and multi-omics data to develop proprietary compounds backed by clinical data to address chronic health conditions and serve the unique needs of consumers, health professionals, and corporations. Thorne Ventures focuses on identifying the next generation of products and services that will advance scientific wellness. Thorne's manufacturing and distribution operations are vertically-integrated and based out of Summerville, South Carolina. Thorne collaborates with Mayo Clinic on health and wellness research and content. Thorne is trusted by millions of customers, health-care professionals, professional athletes, sports teams, and U.S. National Teams.

Tonal uses revolutionary dynamic weight that adjusts to your every move, delivering personalized workouts to help you be your strongest self. Named the ânext great home gymâ by Menâs Health, Tonal is revolutionizing the fitness industry with intelligent technology, expert coaching, and personalized guidance to provide workouts that help people lead stronger, healthier lives. Tonal provides a sleek, compact, wall-mounted digital trainer and associated content through a monthly subscription model that allows in-home, on demand, full-body strength workouts while tracking user progress and adjusting weights via machine learning in real-time for optimal workout experiences.  The Companyâs all-in-one equipment replaces every machine in the weight room with its advanced electromagnetic resistance and content featuring elite coaches, thus allowing smarter, safer workouts that help people reach their fitness goals on their own schedules.

Pioneer and market leader in China's synthetic recombinant human collagen (SRHC) industry. Develops and produces SRHC for skincare products, medical dressings, devices, and aesthetic treatments. Patented innovations and achieved large-scale production of high-quality SRHC with a low carbon footprint. Secured partnerships with cosmetic and pharmaceutical companies. Focus on research and commercialization with an experienced team in DNA sequencing, bioengineering, and medical technology. Collaborates with hospitals in China for clinical trials and data analysis, leading to scientific breakthroughs for new product development and manufacturing.
Uncle Julio's is a leader in the polished casual Mexican restaurant space, offering a differentiated dining experience with a variety of menu items and unique atmosphere.

Urban Egg is a daytime focused restaurant serving scratch-made, elevated breakfast, brunch, and lunch items that take a modern twist on the classics to provide a distinctive culinary experience. The Company uses the freshest, high-quality ingredients to ensure its customers' best day starts at Urban Egg.

Velvet Taco is disrupting the idea of the taco shop, with an inspired response to consumers' increasing desire for premium quality and a fun, authentic dining experience. Founded in 2011, Velvet Taco is a highly differentiated fast-casual taco concept serving premium food in a unique and funky, fast-casual setting. Velvet Taco offers a wide variety of innovative tacos, as well as creative sides and red velvet cake, all scratch-made in-house with the finest, freshest ingredients. The unique concept provides a broad sampling of international tastes and inventive combinations, delivering flavors as memorable as they are delicious. In addition to dozens of local accolades, Velvet Taco was named Nation's Restaurant News' 2016 'Hot Concept' and in 2020 won a Nation's Restaurant News MenuMasters Award in the category of Best Limited-Time Offer for its Weekly Taco Feature.

Vroom is the leading online pre-owned car retailer in the U.S., providing customers with a transparent, quality, and affordable car shopping experience. Sellers receive guaranteed online quotes, and buyers can find impeccably refurbished, pre-owned cars with no-haggle pricing, financing, and free delivery.

West Marine enables the lifestyles of its boating and watersports enthusiast customers as a provider of aftermarket products and services through its integrated network of physical locations and online channels. Founded in 1968, West Marine is the leading integrated, omni-channel provider of aftermarket products and services to the boating, fishing, sailing and watersports markets in the U.S. With 235 physical locations across 38 states and Puerto Rico and two eCommerce platforms reaching domestic, international, and professional customers, West Marine is recognized as the leading resource for cruisers, sailors, anglers, and watersports enthusiasts. In partnership with L Catterton, West Marine plans to continue to optimize its industry-leading marine centers, fast track the advancement of its digital content, commerce, and community capabilities, and deliver remarkable value to customers with product expertise and an exceptional and differentiated consumer experience.

Wild fish populations are threatened more than ever before. Wildtype is the clear leader in cultivated seafood, which will give us the chance to protect our oceans while creating the cleanest seafood on the planet. Wildtype will surely transform our food system with its incredible salmon.

Will's is a pioneer and the most successful fitness lifestyle brand in China. Founded in Shanghai in 1996, Will's Group currently operates more than 130 fitness clubs servicing nearly 400,000 members in 12 Chinese cities. Covering a diverse range of consumer's needs, Will's Group currently operates under three distinct brands in regular, premium and VIP club categories. The Company provides an integrated selection of services, including general fitness space, group classes, personal training, body building, swimming, yoga, spa and nutrition planning. Will's Group is the clear leader in the Chinese fitness industry and a first mover in the fast-growing premium fitness segment.

Leading veterinary services group in Japan that aims to be a trusted partner for pet parents across the country. With a strong team of vets and best-in-class equipment, Withmal focuses on treating pets while handling operational tasks.
