X2's line of healthy Energy Drinks and patented Pre + Intra Workout supplements provide health-conscious athletes of all types with sustained energy from clean ingredients with no crash, no jitters and great taste. Over 35 Pro Teams utilize X2's products to provide their athletes with clean / healthy energy for training and game day performance. X2 is tested, trusted and backed by A-list athletes, including NBA All Star Kawhi Leonard, NFL All-Pro Saquon Barkley, Super Bowl Champion Lavonte David and Peloton Instructor Kendall Toole, with its line of products NSF Certified for Sport® certification, a third party validation of the products' safe ingredient panel.

One of Asia's fastest-growing direct-to-consumer dental products brands. The affordable dental cosmetics market in Asia is growing rapidly, fueled by aesthetic-conscious millennials, and Zenyum has the potential to become the regional champion in this category. The company, which provides 3D-printed invisible braces across eight markets in Asia, has a proprietary technology stack and a large dental partner network, enabling it to make better smiles accessible across the region through a safe and personalized process. Its portfolio, which includes clear aligners as well as oral care products such as electronic toothbrushes, toothpaste, and mouthwash, among others, receives best-in-class customer satisfaction scores. Zenyum works hand-in-hand with dentists to provide every patient with an in-person consultation with a dentist from the company's large network of local dentists who will conduct a thorough examination, as well as an X-Ray and 3D scan, in order to develop a treatment plan specifically customized to each patient's needs. Zenyum's app provides patients with monitoring and guidance throughout the process, and serves as a touchpoint for patients during their clear aligner journey, ultimately reducing chair time in clinics.

Anthony’s Coal Fired has 61 company-owned restaurants in eight states. Anthony attributes the restaurants’ success to a combination of top-quality ingredients, a simple, consistent menu, authentic, coal ovens and the fact that everything is made fresh, from scratch, daily. In 2002, Anthony Bruno unveiled a new concept that introduced the taste of coal oven pizza to South Floridians. He believed there was a great opportunity to create pizza that rivaled the ones he enjoyed growing up in New York. With a focus on fresh ingredients and authentic recipes, Anthony’s signature menu includes traditional and specialty pizzas with dough made daily and stretched to order; fresh coal-oven-roasted chicken wings; large homemade meatballs from a recipe passed down by Anthony’s grandmother; a classic Italian salad with original dressing; and Eggplant Marino (named for Restaurant Partner and NFL Hall of Fame Legend Dan Marino).

A leading independent company with a sole focus on pets, using highest quality, simple, natural ingredients, and a high commitment to safety. Ainsworth works to serve the needs of pets and pet parents by changing the way they shop for their pet's food.

AirX Climate Solutions provides market-leading heating, ventilating and air conditioning appliance and air purification products as well as comprehensive services to worldwide specialty markets. Founded in 1991, Airxcel became a leading designer and manufacturer of functionally-critical, branded products for the HVAC and RV end markets throughout the world. Airxcel had historically operated through two business segments: Specialty HVAC (now âAirX Climate Solutionsâ) and the RV Group, which L Catterton sold to Thor Industries in September 2021. L Catterton retained ownership of AirX Climate Solutions. AirX Climate Solutions provides highly engineered cooling and ventilation solutions serving mission-critical applications across a diverse set of end markets, including telecommunications, data centers, energy storage, rental, educational and industrial/commercial markets. The Airxcel RV Group (now a Thor subsidiary) provides industry-leading branded products in heating, cooling, ventilation, cooking, windows, window covering, side wall and roofing materials for the recreational vehicle industry.

Alasko specializes in providing premium quality frozen fruits & vegetables from around the world. It has a global supply network reaching over 60 agri-food producers in 20 countries. Alasko imports, prepares, and distributes over 80 million pounds of frozen foods. The company's distribution network utilizes 7 warehouses across North America, ensuring optimal efficiency and control of the cold chain. Alasko's internal quality assurance program monitors all products to maintain the highest safety and quality standards. The company markets its products under its own label and private label brands.

Aquasana believes clean water and a healthy environment are the most important components to healthy living and overall well-being. Their sole focus is providing best-in-class water filtration products so every home can enjoy great-tasting, healthy water. With their patent pending Claryum filtration technology, Aquasana water filters transform ordinary tap water into something extraordinary. Aquasana is committed to staying at the forefront of water filtration engineering and innovation. As a result, their customers benefit from a variety of high performance products that are affordable and safe for the environment. Aquasana products are created with the environment in mind. All of their water filter components are engineered for minimal waste including our reusable outer filter casings and filter cartridges made of recyclable parts and compostable materials. In addition, filtered drinking water and Aquasana reusable glass water bottles are a smart choice to reduce plastic bottle waste in landfills.

The leading Italian group of accessory brands. Antichi Pellettieri designs, manufactures, and sells affordable premium fashion apparel, shoes and accessories under 8 Italian brands in Italy, Europe, North America, and Asia. It offers shoes under the following brands: Baldinini, Mario Cerutti, Sebastian and The Saddler brands. A range of leather products under Francesco Biasia, Coccinelle, Mandarina Duck, Ter et Bantine, Enrico Mandelli, and Andrea Pfister brand names. Accessories under Biasia and Braccialini brands. It sells its products in Europe through a network of monobrand and multibrand stores.
Founded in 1764 in France, Baccarat is one of the world's most iconic home luxury brands, operating a global, multi-channel business.

At Baja Fresh you'll find eating well is a way of life and a state of mind. We believe in real food made with passion, for real people. Baja Fresh Mexican Grill opened its first restaurant in August 1990, featuring all-fresh, traditional fire-grilled Mexican favorites. Baja Fresh continues to be passionate about serving the freshest and high-quality food in bright, clean environments. They believe in the benefits of eating well, being active, and making a contribution to the communities they serve. They call this philosophy 'Live Fresh' and you'll find this attitude in everything they do.

A leading French ready-to-wear apparel brand in the dynamic global affordable premium market. Founded in 2003, ba&sh is a fast growing affordable premium fashion brand that designs and manufactures a full range of women’s apparel, with a distinctive design. Sold mainly in premium monobrand retail locations in France, department stores and online, with international expansion in targeted geographies currently underway in the UK, Germany, Switzerland, the USA and Asia.

A global iconic skin wellness brand and purveyor of unapologetic happiness, founded in 1996 with a single New York City spa that ignited a modern skincare revolution. Bliss continues to deliver transformational results through leading-edge, spa-powered products available at accessible prices nationwide and online, and Bliss branded spas globally. The brand offers products that are 100% cruelty-free and free from parabens, phthalates, SLS, SLES, and more, with a belief that inner happiness unlocks outer beauty.

Bloomin' Brands is one of the world's largest casual dining companies with over 91,000 domestic Team Members and more than 1,500 restaurants throughout 48 states, Puerto Rico, Guam and 21 countries. In the late 1980s, four friends who were all veterans of the hospitality industry had the dream of opening their own restaurant. They wanted a place with a casual atmosphere and a strong focus on quality food and service. To differentiate themselves from other dining concepts, they decided an Australian theme fit the relaxed, friendly and fun image they wanted for their new restaurant. With a "No Rules, Just Right" mentality that takes food very seriously, but without taking themselves too seriously and operating under the premise that nothing stands in the way of pleasing the customer, they opened their first Outback Steakhouse restaurant in March 1988 in Tampa, Florida. Outback Steakhouse quickly became known as a place that served a great steak at a reasonable price by people who genuinely cared about the comfort, well-being and joy of their guests. Since the first Outback Steakhouse opened, Bloomin' Brands' family has expanded to include Carrabba's Italian Grill, Bonefish Grill, Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar, and Roy's. Together, these unique, Founder-inspired restaurants that deliver exceptional quality and welcoming hospitality make up Bloomin' Brands, Inc.

Bruxie is a new take on The Sandwich, using a creative version of an authentic Belgian Waffle as the bread. An Orange County Original, Bruxie is a rapidly growing fast casual restaurant concept with ambitions of nationwide expansion. Bruxie waffles are light, airy, crispy, yeasty and not sweet. They are paired with quality seasonal ingredients, offering both Savory choices like Buttermilk Fried Chicken, Prosciutto & Gruyere, and Hot Pastrami, as well as a variety of Sweet options such as our Seasonal Crème Brulee, Nutella & Banana and S'Mores. It's great for breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert!

Build-A-Bear Workshop, Inc. is the leading and only global company that offers an interactive make-your-own stuffed animal retail-entertainment experience. There are approximately 400 Build-A-Bear Workshop stores worldwide, including company-owned stores in the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Ireland, and franchise stores in Europe, Asia, Australia, Africa, the Middle East, and Mexico. In 2012, the company continued its innovation with the introduction of a new store design with an enhanced bear-making process with interactive features. Build a bear Workshop is incorporating the new store design elements into existing stores, in addition to opening new stores.

Leading Italian contemporary furniture designer. Calligaris designs, manufactures, and distributes a full range of home furniture and furnishing accessories. The company sells its products through its stores, studios and galleries, as well as resellers.
French leader of ready-to-wear direct sales designing and distributing clothes, lingerie, and accessories for women and children. Sells directly to consumers through a network of sales consultants.

Founded in 1992, Caribou Coffee Company is one of the leading branded coffee companies in the United States, with a compelling multi-channel approach to their customers. The Company’s coffeehouses aspire to be the community place loved by guests who are provided an extraordinary experience that makes their day better. Caribou Coffee provides the highest quality handcrafted beverages, foods and coffee lifestyle items with a unique blend of expertise, fun and authentic human connection in a comfortable and welcoming coffeehouse environment. Case Logic continues to simplify people's lives with a wide range of cases to transport CDs, DVDs, hard drives and the latest portable electronics. From conveniently-sized compact cameras to full-featured SLRs and all photo equipment in between, Case Logic has cases, slings and backpacks to take them wherever people are capturing moments. For those who carry a tablet or any of the most popular laptops from small to almost-too-big-to-be portable, there's a Case Logic sleeve, attaché, briefcase, messenger or backpack to fit and protect with confidence.

P.F. Chang’s is the Asian leader in premier casual dining around the world. Chang’s features a blend of high-quality, Asian-inspired cuisine and American hospitality in a sophisticated, contemporary setting.

Europe's leading designer, marketer and distributor of accessories for smartphones and tablets. Asia's leading fast fashion retailer of footwear, handbags, and accessories. Cheddar's is a leading casual dining restaurant company with a very distinctive and differentiated offering leveraging its high quality, cooked-from-scratch food at compelling prices in a polished, and casual atmosphere.

Cholula's differentiated pepper and spice blend delivers robust flavor without lingering heat, resulting in a versatility that extends far beyond the everyday condiment. Named after the oldest still-inhabited city in Mexico and introduced into the U.S. in 1989, Cholula has grown to become one of the most beloved hot sauce brands in the world. Cholula is distinguished by its authentic heritage, distinctive flavor profile, and iconic packaging. Made with a unique blend of piquin and arbol peppers that complements a wide array of global cuisines, Cholula's generations-old secret recipe allows consumers to deliciously personalize their food without adding any fat, calories, or carbohydrates.

Cigierre Leading group of the casual dining concepts in Italy. The proprietary brands include Old Wild West, Wiener Haus, Cantina Mariachi, Romeo, Arabian Kebab and Kukkuma.

ClearChoice is the clinical authority on dental implant procedures. On average, our doctors perform more complex procedures in a single month than most of their peers in a full year. Kevin Mosher CEO of ClearChoice Dental Implant Centers ClearChoice is the market leader in providing high quality clinical dental implant services, provided through a network of affiliated centers across the U.S. Dental implants are the preferred long-term solution for those with missing teeth due to superior clinical efficacy and aesthetics, compared with alternative like dentures and bridges. ClearChoice is unique in providing a central point of coordinated care between multiple doctors, resulting in a superior consumer experience in every aspect.

CLIO Award-winning Korean cosmetics company. CLIO is an award-winning Korean color cosmetics company that is famous for its eye, lip and base makeup products. Cover FX creates makeup products that help you look your best while actually improving your skin over time. Culinary Concepts Hospitality Group is a New York City-based restaurant management group which operates and licenses internationally-acclaimed restaurant brands such as Spice Market, J&G Steakhouse, Market, and J&G Grill, each of which was created by Michelin-starred chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten.

Dondup is a unique Italian lifestyle brand. The DONDUP brand, created in the year 2000, introduced a new concept of denim in terms of fit, treatments and attention to detail, with its differentiated products making DONDUP a real Italian success story.

#1 professional skincare brand from Taiwan. Founded in 2003 by renowned dermatologist Dr. Yin-Ching Wu, Dr. Wu is Taiwan's leading clinical skincare brand. Edible Arrangements brings happiness to all of life's occasions with an array of irresistibly fresh products, including handcrafted fruit arrangements and gourmet chocolate dipped fruit. ELEMIS harnesses the power of nature and science to create ground-breaking formulations that genuinely transform your skin. The brand is available at over 1,600 spas, salons, stores, and multiple e-retailers worldwide. ELEMIS is a division of Steiner Leisure Limited.

Spanish brand with an edgy-preppy Londonian style. Founded in 2004 and based in Spain, El Ganso is a Spanish apparel, shoes and accessories retailer for men, women and children. Emperor Watch & Jewellery is a leading retailer of jewelry and watches in Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau with an extensive network of retail outlets at prime locations, including multibrand and monobrand boutiques.

EMU is an iconic Italian designer of the premium outdoor furniture market. Located in Perugia, Umbria, the company designs, manufactures and commercializes its products through wholesalers and distributors globally. Energy Brands is a pioneer in the functional soft drinks category. Based in New York, the company designs and markets functional soft drinks called vitamin water. The products are non-carbonated and enhanced with vitamins and nutrients. Energy Brands was acquired by Coca-Cola in 2007.

Enjoy Technology is the pioneer of the next generation “at home” digital retail store. Consumers select the service during the online check-out process for high value electronics (e.g., iPhone upgrade) and at no cost are able to have the product delivered and fully set up by an Enjoy expert within the same day. During the in-home visit, experts teach consumers how to make the most use of their new device, and offer additional products and services. Enjoy's services are a unique solution to multiple stakeholder pain points: consumers have a faster delivery, better experience, and get the most value from their products. At the same time, brands are able to increase revenue through more cross-selling, lower overall costs, and a better customer experience. Enjoy has consistently achieved high NPS scores (90+) from consumers and has been able to establish multi-year contracts with guaranteed volumes from some of the most compelling brands in the world (AT&T, Google, BT-EE, Rogers, Sonos).

Distinctive Indian retail brand offering ready-to-wear garments, home furnishings, food and personal care products and accessories. Ferrara Candy Company is the largest independent domestic manufacturer of sugar confectionary products. Decadently effective shampoos, conditioners, treatments and stylers. Created with the world’s most demanding women in mind. Masterfully crafted and perfected at the legendary Frédéric Fekkai Salons. Adored by style mavens and editors alike. Worth the splurge in pleasure and performance. Because your hair deserves nothing less.

Forté Pharma is a Monaco-based pharmaceutical company strongly recognized for the formulation and distribution of over-the-counter nutritional supplements for slimming, health, and beauty purposes, across France, Belgium, Italy and Spain.

World-renowned brand in classic sportswear. Founded in 1949 in the U.S., Gant specializes in the design and distribution of classic men and women sportswear and accessories. The leading global eyewear designer brand. With the goal of establishing a leading international retail, business, and tourism center in Tokyo, the project comprehensively redeveloped two city blocks in Ginza Chuo-ku (Ginza 6-chome District 10 and District 11) including the former site of the 'Matsuzakaya Ginza department store'. Gold Coast Beverage Distributors is one of the largest beer and beverage distributors in the U.S. It has been in operation since 1946 as a beer and water wholesaler. The company expanded its business through strategic acquisitions, becoming the largest beer distributor in Florida and one of the top 10 in sales in the United States.

Leading French player in restaurant, catering and food concepts. Created in 1994, Groupe Bertrand is one the leading French restaurant group, growing swiftly through acquisitions and development of innovative dining concepts. From fast food to urban casual, to traditional and festive dining. It also has a catering and special event business unit. Amongst others, the group owns the following iconic brands: Angelina, Brasserie, Lipp, Burger King, etc. The company also designs, selects, and distributes French gastronomy products to specialty retailers, luxury grocers, renowned hotels and restaurants.

An Italian gourmet brand renowned for exceptional quality. Brian Brady built his field of dreams RV company resulting in a vehicle offering the best design, functionality and value to the consumer. Heartland focuses on the next generation engineering. Their patented improved turning radius, universal docking centers and unmatched storage are testaments to their innovation.
At HelloWorld, we are enriching the engagement between brands and consumers through the use of scalable technology that provides measurable results and marketing solutions for our clients.

Home Chef is a meal kit delivery service with fresh ingredients and easy-to-follow recipes available nationwide. Ideal Image is North America's #1 aesthetics brand, offering personal aesthetic and wellness services to help customers feel their best and unlock their confidence. Europe’s largest international fashion watches and eyewear licensing conglomerate. A famous imaginative toys retail brand. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Zaragoza, Spain, Imaginarium engages in the retail of educational toys for children. The leading player in multi-brand casual dining in India. Jarden is a world-class consumer products company with a diverse portfolio of innovative products, iconic market-leading brands and a global presence.
